title: Karan Johar Performed Diwali Puja In K3G Style and These Pictures & Videos Prove Just That
text:
Karan Johar Performed Diwali Puja In K3G Style and These Pictures & Videos Prove Just That

Karan Johar Performed Diwali Puja In K3G Style and These Pictures & Videos Prove Just That

If you are a Bollywood buff, we’re sure you must have loved the Raichand family’s Diwali celebration in Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham where Jaya Bachchan’s sixth sense tells her that her son played by SRK was at the doorstep. That was brilliant, or maybe not?

Twitter

The Diwali celebrations in the movie were grand. From people, or shall we say Bollywood celebs, dressed up in expensive ethnic attires to guests dancing in synchronised dance moves, from pooja ki thali to grand decorations, it was a heartwarming celebration, right?

Karan Johar who organised Diwali Puja at his home invited a lot of stars, particularly the star kids. From Janhvi Kapoor to Sara Ali Khan and Varun Dhawan, it was again a star studded Puja, which was performed in K3G style.

Don't Miss 740 SHARES 117 SHARES 39.2 K SHARES 11.7 K SHARES 4.7 K SHARES

Kartik Aaryan shared a video in which Karan Johar is holding the Puja ki Thali and there’s K3G’s trademark tune playing in the background. Take a look!

Here are some more pictures from Karan Johar’s Diwali Puja.
